The misleading online advertisement on t: S. Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez was married in early February 2021.
The article on the Hollywood Tale websit: which the ad led readers to, did not mention anything about Ocasio-Cortez being married or having a husband.
Near the end of the article: there was an incomplete and poorly written page that described Ocasio-Cortez's boyfriend, Riley Roberts, indicating that she was not married at the time.
The 2018 Vogue profile of Ocasio: Cortez confirmed that she was living with her boyfriend, Riley Roberts, in a one-bedroom apartment, further supporting the fact that she was not married in early February 2021.
